A5E.migration.starting: Applying Level Up system migration for version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.
A5E.migration.finished: Level Up system migration to version {version} completed!

compendium.starting: Applying Migration to Compendium Pack {packName}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.

A5E.originSheets.optionalSelectionHint: Note: Green tags represent selected options. Orange tags represent optional choices presented by the origin sheet. Grey tags represent choices that the character already has.

cantrip.damage: Plus an additional {formula} damage at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.
cantrip.healing: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.
cantrip.target: Plus an additional {formula} {targetType} at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.
cantrip.template: The {shape}'s {property} increases by {formula} {unit} at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.
cantrip.templateMulti: The {shape}'s {property1} increases by {formula1} {unit} and its {property2} increases by {formula2} {unit} at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

spellLevel.damage: Plus an additional {formula} damage per slot level above {level}.
spellLevel.healing: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} per slot level above {level}.
spellLevel.target: Plus an additional {formula} {targetType} per slot level above {level}.
spellLevel.template: The {shape}'s {property} increases by {formula} {unit} for every slot level above {level}.
spellLevel.templateMulti: The {shape}'s {property1} increases by {formula1} {unit} and its {property2} increases by {formula2} {unit} for every slot level above {level}.

steppedSpellLevel.damage: Plus an additional {formula} damage per {step} slot levels above {level}.
steppedSpellLevel.healing: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} per {step} slot levels above {level}
steppedSpellLevel.target: Plus an additional {formula} {targetType} per {step} slot levels above {level}.
steppedSpellLevel.template: The {shape}'s {property} increases by {formula} {unit} for every {step} slot levels above {level}.
steppedSpellLevel.templateMulti: The {shape}'s {property1} increases by {formula1} {unit} and its {property2} increases by {formula2} {unit} for every {step} slot levels above {level}.

spellPoint.damage: Plus an additional {formula} damage per additional spell point expended.
spellPoint.healing: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} per additional spell point expended.
spellPoint.target: Plus an additional {formula} {targetType} per additional spell point expended.
spellPoint.template: The {shape}'s {property} increases by {formula} {unit} for every additional spell point expended.
spellPoint.templateMulti: The {shape}'s {property1} increases by {formula1} {unit} and its {property2} increases by {formula2} {unit} for every additional spell point expended.

steppedSpellPoint.damage: Plus an additional {formula} damage per additional {step} spell points expended.
steppedSpellPoint.healing: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} per additional {step} spell points expended.
steppedSpellPoint.target: Plus an additional {formula} {targetType} per additional {step} spell points expended.
steppedSpellPoint.template: The {shape}'s {property} increases by {formula} {unit} for every {step} additional spell points expended.
steppedSpellPoint.templateMulti: The {shape}'s {property1} increases by {formula1} {unit} and its {property2} increases by {formula2} {unit} for every {step} additional spell points expended.

uses.damage: Plus an additional {formula} damage per additional use expended.
uses.healing: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} per additional use expended.
uses.target: Plus an additional {formula} {targetType} per additional use expended.
uses.template: The {shape}'s {property} increases by {formula} {unit} for every additional use expended.
uses.templateMulti: The {shape}'s {property1} increases by {formula1} {unit} and its {property2} increases by {formula2} {unit} for every additional use expended.

steppedUses.damage: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.
steppedUses.healing: Plus an additional {formula} {healingType} per additional {step} uses expended.
steppedUses.target: Plus an additional {formula} {targetType} per additional {step} uses expended.
steppedUses.template: The {shape}'s {property} increases by {formula} {unit} for every {step} additional uses expended.
steppedUses.templateMulti: The {shape}'s {property1} increases by {formula1} {unit} and its {property2} increases by {formula2} {unit} for every {step} additional uses expended.

hints.5eStyleDeathSaves: When enabled, rolling a one on a Death Saving Throw incurs two failures. When disabled, the standard A5e rules are used (one failure and one point of Fatigue and Strife).
hints.blindDeathSaves: When enabled, death saving rolls in chat cards and results on the actor will be hidden from players.
hints.alwaysShowActionDescription: Always show the description of an action in the chat card regardless of the setting defined on the action.
hints.automateConditions: Automatically apply related effects for the selected conditions.
hints.automateBloodiedApplication: Enable automated application of the bloodied condition.
hints.automateUnconsciousApplication: Enable automated application of the unconscious and dead condition.
hints.critCalculationMode: Select the method of determining critical damage on a critical hit.
hints.diagonalRule: Configure the diagonal movement rule used.
hints.effectsPanelIconSize: Set the default size of the icons in the effects panel.
hints.effectsPanelPosition: Set the top, bottom, and right offset for the effects panel. The values are in pixels.
hints.enableRadialEffects: Change the default effects hud to display effects in a circle around the token.
hints.halflingLuck: When enabled d20 rolls resulting in a 1 will be automatically rerolled.
hints.collapseActionList: When enabled, the action list will be hidden on locked sheets to reduce clutter. If an item has actions with uses, the actions will remain visible for that item.
hints.hideDeletionConfirmationDialog: When this setting is enabled, you can delete items from actor sheets without being presented with a dialog window to confirm the deletion.
hints.hideChatDescriptionsByDefault: When this setting is enabled, the description sections of Item chat cards will be hidden by default. You can still reveal the description sections by clicking on the header of the chat card.
hints.hideRandomizedHPRolls: Hide the roll chat card for generating random NPC hit points.
hints.itemRightClickConfigure: Set the right click keybinding to configure an item instead of expanding it. This setting works even when the actor is in locked mode.
hints.jackOfAllTrades: When enabled, half of your proficiency bonus (rounded down) will be added to all skill and tool ability checks that do not already include your proficiency bonus.
hints.newActionNameType: Select the default name type for new actions. The System choice will use different names based on the type of the item document. The Action choice will always use the name 'New Action. The Item choice will always use the name of the item for the action name.
hints.placeItemTemplateDefault: Automatically select the 'Place Measured Template' option in the roll dialog for features, spells, etc. overriding the default item configuration.
hints.preventActionRollOnWarning: Prevent users from rolling if a validation warning is present.
hints.protectRolls: When enabled, players will be unable to see roll formulae for any rolls made by actors they do not have at least observer permissions for. The DCs of any saving throws will also be hidden from them
hints.randomizeNPCHitPoints: When enabled, the hit points of NPCs with be randomly rolled based on their hit point formula when an actor is dragged to a scene.
hints.removeActiveEffectsOnLongRest: When enabled, all onUse active effects will be removed from the actor when a long rest is taken.
hints.replaceFatigueAndStrife: When enabled, the Fatigue and Strife conditions will be replaced with the Exhaustion condition.
hints.reverseAltBehavior: By default, holding the left alt key will skip the roll dialog for rolls. If this setting is checked, the roll dialog will be skipped unless the alt key is held when clicking the roll button.
hints.reverseInitiativeAltBehavior: By default, holding the left alt key will skip the roll dialog for initiative rolls. If this setting is checked, the initiative roll dialog will be skipped unless the alt key is held when clicking the roll button.
hints.showDescriptionOnLimitedPerms: Show description on items when items have limited permissions. This will respected the identified state of the item.
hints.showEffectsPanel: The effects panel shows a summary of the conditions and temporary effects for the selected token. You can find these icons on the right side of the screen, left of the chat window.
hints.terseRollFormulae: The system provides detailed roll annotations in chat card roll formulae. Enabling this setting removes all roll annotations in this formula display, providing a cleaner aesthetic at the expense of clarity.
hints.trackCurrencyWeight: Each coin will add 0.02lbs to the weight being carried.

A5E.settings.title: System Settings
A5E.settings.reload: This operation will refresh the page.
A5E.settings.collapseActionList: Hide action list in locked mode
A5E.settings.critDoubleDiceQuantityAndMods: Double dice quantity and double modifiers
A5E.settings.critMaxDamagePlusRoll: Maximize dice damage and roll a second set
A5E.settings.hideRandomizedHPRolls: Hide NPC randomized hit point rolls
A5E.settings.includeAbilityModifiersForSkills: Include ability modifiers in skill modifiers
A5E.settings.removeActiveEffectsOnLongRest: Remove active effects on long rest
A5E.settings.replaceFatigueAndStrife: Replace Fatigue and Strife with Exhaustion
A5E.settings.restoreSpellPointsOnShortRest: Restore spell points on a short rest
A5E.settings.restoreSpellSlotsOnShortRest: Restore spell slots on a short rest
A5E.settings.reverseAltBehavior: Reverse alt behavior for all rolls
A5E.settings.showDescriptionOnLimitedPerms: Show description when ownership is limited

hints.1: • Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
hints.2:

  • Disadvantage on concentration checks
hints.3:
• Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
  • Disadvantage on concentration checks
  • Can only take a bonus action or action each turn (not both)
hints.4:
• Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
  • Disadvantage on concentration checks
  • Can only take a bonus action or action each turn (not both)
  • Disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws using Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma
hints.5:
• Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
  • Disadvantage on concentration checks
  • Can only take a bonus action or action each turn (not both)
  • Disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws using Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma
  • Suffer the effects of a randomly determined short-term mental stress effect.
hints.6:
• Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
  • Disadvantage on concentration checks
  • Can only take a bonus action or action each turn (not both)
  • Disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws using Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma
  • Suffer the effects of a randomly determined short-term mental stress effect.
  • Cannot cast spells (but can cast cantrips)
hints.7:
• Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks
  • Disadvantage on concentration checks
  • Can only take a bonus action or action each turn (not both)
  • Disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws using Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma
  • Suffer the effects of a randomly determined short-term mental stress effect.
  • Cannot cast spells (but can cast cantrips)
  • Suffer the effects of a randomly determined long-term mental stress effect.
